GUI_Config.Toast_Title: A new tool is available on your device
GUI_Config.Toast_Text:
A new tool allowing you to solve issues yourself is available on your device.
Click on the SelfX shortcut available on your desktop or Start menu to launch the tool.
GUI_Config.Subtitle_Text: You may find a way to solve it here with a list of clickable solutions
GUI_Config.Run_solution_Text: Allows you to run an action
GUI_Config.Run_explanation_Text: Allows you to get more info

Action.Name: Restart Windows Management Services
Action.Explanation: Restart core Windows services used for updates, software installs, and device management
Action.Alerte_MSG:
An action will be executed in the background. Core Windows services will be restarted.
You may briefly lose network connectivity.
Do you want to continue?

Action.Name: Force Group Policy Update (Computer)
Action.Explanation: Force the computer to reapply system policies from the network
Action.Alerte_MSG:
An action will be executed in the background. Computer policies will be refreshed.
A restart may be required.
Do you want to continue?

Action.Name: Resync System Time
Action.Explanation: Force your computer to sync its clock with the network time server
Action.Alerte_MSG:
An action will be executed in the background. Your system time will be updated.
Do you want to continue?

Action.Name: Clear Windows Update Cache
Action.Explanation: Fix update issues by clearing the Windows Update download cache
Action.Alerte_MSG:
An action will be executed in the background. Windows Update files will be cleared and rebuilt.

Do you want to continue?
